name: Generate User Invoices
author: WPZA

sections.description:
This plugin from WPZA provides your website with invoicing user functionality to generate multiple invoices without any e-commerce functionality.

Using an administrator’s account, you can generate and automatically email WordPress users (subscribers) that they have a new or updated invoice to view.

Invoicing Plugin Features

  • Bulk user invoicing;
  • Global currency settings;
  • Optional tax rates;
  • Automatic emails upon invoice generation or change.

Custom Theming

To override the default invoice single and archive templates, simply copy the files from the plugin’s templates folder into your theme’s directory.
sections.installation: You can install this plugin like any other WordPress plugin. After installing, if the invoices show as a 404-page error; you should try refresh your permalinks in your WordPress settings. If working as normal, you can start to generate invoices for your users (set as subscribers).
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

You can install this plugin like any other WordPress plugin. After installing, if the invoices show as a 404-page error; you should try refresh your permalinks in your WordPress settings. If working as normal, you can start to generate invoices for your users (set as subscribers).
